Webtrees.WebtreesVersionDescr: Version installed on the webtrees website
Webtrees.WebtreesVersionInlineHelp: Choose the version of webtrees currently installed.
Webtrees.WebtreesRootUrlDescr: Root URL of the webtrees website
Webtrees.WebtreesRootUrlInlineHelp: Enter the root URL for the webtrees website on which administrative tasks should be triggered. Value must be a valid URL.
Webtrees.WebtreesRootUrlError: The webtrees root url must be a valid URL.
Webtrees.WebtreesTokenDescr: Token to force execution of the task
Webtrees.WebtreesTokenInlineHelp: Enter the generated token used to force the execution of the task. It is generated within the webtrees tasks adiministration panel.
Webtrees.WebtreesTaskNameDescr: Name of the task to execute
Webtrees.WebtreesTaskNameInlineHelp: Enter the name of the task to execute. The task name must exist in the webtrees site.
Webtrees.WebtreesTaskNameError: The task name is not valid.
